subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|手|t1=hand|毄|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to strike with the hand.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[strike]]; to [[hit]]; to [[beat]]
# to [[stab]]; to [[pierce]]
# to [[attack]]; to [[fight]]
# to [[come into]] [[contact]] with
